fileDescription: Strings for the Steamworks wrapper extension plugin.

steamworks_ext.name: Steamworks
steamworks_ext.description: Access Steam features in the Windows, macOS and Linux exporters.

app-id.name: App ID
app-id.desc: The Steam App ID to use. Leave empty to allow Steam to determine it.

development-mode.name: Development mode
development-mode.desc: Check to enable development mode, which sets the app ID and disables automatic restarting. Turn off for release.

enable-overlay.name: Enable overlay
enable-overlay.desc: Whether to enable the Steam in-game overlay (Windows only, requires r457+). When disabled, Steam uses fallback behavior.

is-available.description: True if successfully initialized the Steam API.

is-running-on-steam-deck.description: Checks if Steam is running on a Steam Deck device.

on-overlay-shown.description: Triggered when the game overlay is shown.

on-overlay-hidden.description: Triggered when the game overlay is hidden.

on-any-achievement-unlock-success.description: Triggered after any successful 'Unlock achievement' action.

on-achievement-unlock-success.description: Triggered after a successful 'Unlock achievement' action.

on-any-achievement-unlock-error.description: Triggered after any 'Unlock achievement' action fails.

on-achievement-unlock-error.description: Triggered after an 'Unlock achievement' action failed.

on-dlc-installed-check-complete.description: Triggered after 'Check DLC installed' when the status is updated.

is-dlc-installed.description: Check if DLC is installed by its app ID. Note this can only be used after 'On DLC installed check complete' triggers.

app-id.name: App ID
app-id.desc: The DLC app ID to check if installed.

on-dlc-installed.description: Triggered after the 'Install DLC' action when the DLC has been installed.

on-get-auth-ticket-for-web-api-success.list-name: On get auth ticket for web api success
on-get-auth-ticket-for-web-api-success.display-text: On get auth ticket for web api success
on-get-auth-ticket-for-web-api-success.description: Triggered after 'Get auth ticket for web API' when a ticket was obtained successfully.

on-get-auth-ticket-for-web-api-error.list-name: On get auth ticket for web api error
on-get-auth-ticket-for-web-api-error.display-text: On get auth ticket for web api error
on-get-auth-ticket-for-web-api-error.description: Triggered after 'Get auth ticket for web API' when a ticket failed to be obtained.

show-overlay-url.description: Show the Steam game overlay and load a URL from the web.

url.name: URL
url.desc: The URL to load in the overlay.

modal.name: Modal
modal.desc: Whether to display the URL in a modal style in the overlay.

unlock-achievement.description: Unlock an achievement for the current Steam game.

clear-achievement.description: Reset the unlock status of an achievement. Typically only used for testing purposes.

check-dlc-installed.description: Check the installed status of one or more DLC.

app-ids.name: App ID(s)
app-ids.desc: A number of the app ID to check, or a comma-separated string of multiple app IDs to check.

install-dlc.description: Install DLC by its app ID.

app-id.name: App ID
app-id.desc: The app ID of the DLC to install.

uninstall-dlc.description: Uninstall DLC by its app ID.

app-id.name: App ID
app-id.desc: The app ID of the DLC to uninstall.

get-auth-ticket-for-web-api.list-name: Get auth ticket for web API
get-auth-ticket-for-web-api.display-text: Get auth ticket for web API (identity [i]{0}[/i])
get-auth-ticket-for-web-api.description: Retrieve an authentication ticket from the Steamworks API.

identity.name: Identity
identity.desc: The identity of the remote service that will authenticate the ticket. Leave as an empty string if none was provided.

cancel-auth-ticket.description: Cancel a previously obtained authentication ticket.

set-rich-presence.description: Set a Rich Presence key/value for the current user that is automatically shared to all friends playing the same game.

key.name: Key
key.desc: The rich presence key to set, e.g. "status".

value.name: Value
value.desc: A string to associate with the key. Use an empty string to remove the key.

clear-rich-presence.description: Clears all of the current user's rich presence keys and values.

trigger-screenshot.description: Activate the Steam feature to take a screenshot. Requires the overlay to be active.

account-id.description: The current user's Steam account ID.

steam-id-64-bit.description: The current user's Steam ID (64-bit representation, as a string).

static-account-key.description: The current user's Steam static account key (as a string).

app-owner-account-id.description: The app owner's Steam account ID (for Family Sharing).

app-owner-steam-id-64-bit.description: The app owner's Steam ID (for Family Sharing, 64-bit representation, as a string).

app-owner-static-account-key.description: The app owner's Steam static account key as a string (for Family Sharing).

persona-name.description: The current user's Steam persona (display) name.

player-steam-level.description: Gets the Steam level of the user, as shown on their Steam community profile.

app-id.description: Gets the App ID of the current game.

steam-ui-language.description: Returns the language the Steam client is running in.

current-game-language.description: Gets the current language that the user has set.

available-game-languages.description: Gets a comma separated list of the languages the current app supports.

achievement.description: In an achievement trigger, the 'API Name' of the achievement.

trigger-app-id.description: The app ID for a trigger, e.g. 'On DLC installed'.

auth-ticket.description: The authentication ticket that was obtained (a HAuthTicket in the Steamworks SDK).

ticket-hex-str.description: The ticket that was created as a hexadecimal string.
